english_description: Send tagged PII data over HTTP to demonstrate privacy enforcement.
cnl_code:
Module tests.typecheck.pii.

Rule sendSensitiveEmail given email, produce. It performs io [Http]:
  Return Http.post("http://api.example.com/send", email).

english_description: Wrap CPU-only helpers and let inference prove no IO is required.
cnl_code:
Module demo.eff_infer_wrapper_cpu.

Rule helperWithCPU given text, produce. It performs cpu:
  Return Cpu.hash(text).

Rule wrapperWithCPU given input, produce. It performs cpu:
  Return helperWithCPU(input).

english_description: Split an email address to return its domain or an empty string.
cnl_code:
Module ai.generated.case9.

Rule extractDomain given email: Text, produce Text:
  If not Text.contains(email, "@"),:
    Return "".
  Let parts be Text.split(email, "@").
  Return List.get(parts, 1).

english_description: Send an email address tagged as PII over HTTP (intentional violation).
cnl_code:
Module ai.generated.case28.

Rule shareProfile given email: @pii(L2, email) Text, produce Text. It performs io [Http]:
  Return Http.post("/profiles/share", email).

english_description: Multiply purchases by a multiplier to award loyalty points.
cnl_code:
Module ai.generated.case11.

Rule loyaltyPoints given purchases: Int, multiplier: Int, produce Int:
  Return purchases times multiplier.

english_description: Score a loan request by checking credit score, debt ratio, and assigning a rate.
cnl_code:
Module ai.generated.case32.

Define LoanRequest has applicantId: Text, amount: Int, income: Int, creditScore: Int.

Define LoanDecision has approved: Bool, reason: Text, rate: Int.

Rule scoreLoan given request: LoanRequest, produce LoanDecision:
  If request.creditScore less than 620,:
    Return LoanDecision with approved = false, reason = "Low credit", rate = 0.
  If request.amount greater than (request.income times 4),:
    Return LoanDecision with approved = false, reason = "Debt ratio", rate = 0.
  If request.creditScore at least 760,:
    Return LoanDecision with approved = true, reason = "Prime", rate = 4.
  If request.creditScore at least 700,:
    Return LoanDecision with approved = true, reason = "Preferred", rate = 6.
  Return LoanDecision with approved = true, reason = "Standard", rate = 8.

english_description: Demonstrate a workflow with an IO step that never declares any compensation handler.
cnl_code:
Module tests.workflow.missing.

To missingComp, produce. It performs io:
  
  workflow:
    step fetch:
      Return ok of Http.get("/orders").
  
  .

english_description: Hash text without declaring the required CPU capability.
cnl_code:
Module tests.typecheck.effects.cpu.

Rule hashText given value, produce:
  Return Cpu.hash(value).

english_description: Declare both HTTP and SQL capabilities so a helper can fetch data and persist it safely.
cnl_code:
Module test.eff.valid.http_sql.

To fetch_user, produce. It performs io [Http, Sql]:
  Let data be Http.get("/api/user").
  Return Db.insert("users", data).

english_description: Add up three daily click counters to get a total.
cnl_code:
Module ai.generated.case12.

Rule sumClicks given day1: Int, day2: Int, day3: Int, produce Int:
  Let firstTwo be day1 plus day2.
  Return firstTwo plus day3.

english_description: Show valid usage of the Payment capability for charge and refund helpers.
cnl_code:
Module test.typechecker.payment_success.

// Valid Payment capability usage - should produce no errors

Rule processPaymentValid given orderId, amount, produce. It performs io [Payment]:
  Return ok of Payment.charge(orderId, amount).

Rule refundPaymentValid given paymentId, produce. It performs io [Payment]:
  Return ok of Payment.refund(paymentId).

english_description: Join a first and last name with a single space.
cnl_code:
Module ai.generated.case3.

Rule fullName given first: Text, last: Text, produce Text:
  Let firstPart be Text.concat(first, " ").
  Return Text.concat(firstPart, last).

english_description: Show what happens when code calls an alias that was never mapped to a real capability.
cnl_code:
Module test.eff.alias_unmapped.

Use Http as H.

To call_unmapped_alias, produce:
  Return X.get("/api").

To call_partial_match, produce:
  Return H.get("/api").

To call_nonexistent_prefix, produce:
  Return UnknownModule.method().

english_description: Propagate nested IO requirements from leaf calls up through intermediate and root helpers.
cnl_code:
Module test.eff.valid.nested.

To leaf_http, produce. It performs io [Http]:
  Return Http.get("/health").

To mid_io, produce. It performs io [Http, Sql]:
  Let resp be leaf_http().
  Return Db.insert("logs", resp).

To root_io, produce. It performs io [Http, Sql, Time]:
  Let data be mid_io().
  Let ts be Time.now().
  Return (ts plus ": ") plus data.

english_description: Strip the user portion from a PII-tagged email and only keep the domain.
cnl_code:
Module ai.generated.case29.

Rule anonymizeEmail given value: @pii(L2, email) Text, produce Text:
  If not Text.contains(value, "@"),:
    Return "invalid".
  Let parts be Text.split(value, "@").
  Let domain be List.get(parts, 1).
  Return Text.concat("***@", domain).

english_description: Rotate a secret and return a labeled string.
cnl_code:
Module ai.generated.case22.

Rule rotateSecretAndLabel given key: Text, produce Text. It performs io [Secrets]:
  Let token be Secrets.rotate(key).
  Return Text.concat("rotated:", token).
